actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize the President of the United States to designate National Ski Week.

summary.text: Authorizes the President of the United States to designate the week beginning on the first Saturday after the first Tuesday in January as "National Ski Week".

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize the President of the United States to designate National Ski Week.
